article.Heading: GST council may up compensation cess ceiling for SUVs, big cars: Sources
article.Summary: Sources tell CNBC-TV18 that the goods and services tax (GST) Council may raise compensation cess ceiling for SUVs, big cars.
article.Body:
Sources tell CNBC-TV18 that the goods and services tax (GST) Council may raise compensation cess ceiling for SUVs, big cars.

Watch accompanying video of CNBC-TV18â€™s Sapna Das for more details.
